instruction: Develop a virtual museum exhibit on the evolution of video games, including a curated gallery (image), interactive timeline (text, image), and a documentary-style video (video).
output-abstract: 1. Curated gallery, 2. Interactive timeline, 3. Documentary video.
output-detail: 1. Curated gallery: Select and visually capture iconic video games across different eras. 2. Interactive timeline: Combine textual information with images to represent key milestones in gaming history. 3. Documentary video: Narrate the evolution, challenges, and breakthroughs in the gaming industry.

instruction: Create a multi-modal recipe guide for a vegan chocolate cake, including a step-by-step guide (text), images (image) of each step, and a tutorial video (video).
output-abstract: 1. Step-by-step guide, 2. Images, 3. Tutorial video.
output-detail: 1. Step-by-step guide: Write clear, concise instructions for each stage of the baking process. 2. Images: Take high-quality photos showcasing each major step in the recipe. 3. Tutorial video: Produce a captivating, instructional video covering the full baking process, from ingredient preparation to the final product.

instruction: Produce a podcast episode exploring the psychology of productivity, featuring expert interviews (audio), a summarized blog post (text), and accompanying infographics (image).
output-abstract: 1. Expert interviews, 2. Summarized blog post, 3. Infographics.
output-detail: 1. Expert interviews: Record in-depth discussions with psychologists and productivity coaches. 2. Summarized blog post: Condense key insights from interviews into an engaging, accessible article. 3. Infographics: Design visual summaries of the main points discussed in the blog post for quick reference.

instruction: Design a marketing campaign for a fictional eco-friendly car model, including a logo (image), a catchphrase (text), an advertisement video (video), and a background music track (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Logo, 2. Catchphrase, 3. Advertisement video, 4. Background music.
output-detail: 1. Logo: Use green and blue colors to symbolize eco-friendliness. Incorporate car and leaf imagery. 2. Catchphrase: Craft a catchy and memorable phrase highlighting sustainability. 3. Advertisement video: Create a compelling narrative showcasing the car's features and environmental benefits. 4. Background music: Compose a light, inspirational sound palette that complements the video's message.

instruction: Compile an educational module on ancient civilizations, featuring a series of lecture videos (video), interactive quizzes (text, image), and a virtual reality exploration experience (video, image, audio).
output-abstract: 1. Lecture videos, 2. Interactive quizzes, 3. Virtual reality experience.
output-detail: 1. Lecture videos: Produce detailed presentations on various ancient civilizations, focusing on culture, technology, and impact on modern society. 2. Interactive quizzes: Develop quizzes with both textual questions and image-based puzzles to test understanding. 3. Virtual reality experience: Create immersive VR simulations that allow users to explore ancient city replicas and learn through interactive storytelling.

instruction: Organize a virtual concert featuring several artists, including live performances (video, audio), artist interviews (text, video), and a digital album booklet (image, text).
output-abstract: 1. Live performances, 2. Artist interviews, 3. Digital album booklet.
output-detail: 1. Live performances: Stream high-quality audio and video of artists performing. 2. Artist interviews: Conduct and publish interviews, combining text summaries with short video clips. 3. Digital album booklet: Design a visually appealing booklet with artist bios, song lyrics, and exclusive images.

instruction: Create a comprehensive guide on maintaining mental health, encompassing a series of articles (text), an eBook (text, image), motivational podcasts (audio), and relaxation technique videos (video).
output-abstract: 1. Articles, 2. eBook, 3. Podcasts, 4. Technique videos.
output-detail: 1. Articles: Write informative pieces on different aspects of mental health, such as coping mechanisms, stress management, and the benefits of therapy. 2. eBook: Compile the articles into an eBook, enhanced with illustrative images and practical tips. 3. Podcasts: Produce episodes featuring discussions with mental health professionals and motivational content. 4. Technique videos: Film demonstrations of relaxation techniques, such as meditation and breathing exercises.

instruction: Develop a mobile app that teaches programming basics featuring interactive lessons (text, image), coding challenge videos (video), and a forum for discussion (text).
output-abstract: 1. Interactive lessons, 2. Coding challenge videos, 3. Forum discussion.
output-detail: 1. Interactive lessons: Create text-based tutorials with visual aids to explain fundamental programming concepts. 2. Coding challenge videos: Produce videos that pose coding problems followed by step-by-step solutions. 3. Forum discussion: Implement a text-based forum where learners can discuss lessons, share code, and seek help.

instruction: Produce an online photography course, covering basics to advanced techniques, including tutorial articles (text), sample photo galleries (image), critique sessions recordings (video), and fieldwork audio logs (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Tutorial articles, 2. Sample galleries, 3. Critique videos, 4. Audio logs.
output-detail: 1. Tutorial articles: Write comprehensive guides on various photography techniques and equipment. 2. Sample galleries: Showcase examples of photos taken using the techniques described. 3. Critique videos: Record video sessions of photo critiques, offering constructive feedback. 4. Audio logs: Include narrated fieldwork adventures, emphasizing the importance of exploring to find the perfect shot.

instruction: Create an interactive historical map of Rome, incorporating narrated stories (audio), detailed text descriptions (text), visual timelines (image), and 360-degree exploration videos (video).
output-abstract: 1. Narrated stories, 2. Descriptions, 3. Timelines, 4. Exploration videos.
output-detail: 1. Narrated stories: Record audio narrations recounting significant events in Rome's history. 2. Descriptions: Write comprehensive text descriptions for major landmarks and historical periods. 3. Timelines: Design visual timelines highlighting key dates and events in Roman history. 4. Exploration videos: Create 360-degree videos of important Roman sites, allowing viewers a virtual visit experience.

instruction: Assemble a digital magazine issue themed around future technologies, including feature articles (text), artist concept illustrations (image), expert interviews (audio), and an augmented reality section (image, video).
output-abstract: 1. Feature articles, 2. Concept illustrations, 3. Expert interviews, 4. Augmented reality section.
output-detail: 1. Feature articles: Write insightful articles exploring potential future technologies and their societal impacts. 2. Concept illustrations: Collaborate with artists to create visuals of imagined future tech. 3. Expert interviews: Record conversations with scientists and technologists discussing the feasibility and challenges of future innovations. 4. Augmented reality section: Design an interactive section where readers can use their devices to experience augmented reality representations of the technologies discussed.

instruction: Design an online course on sustainable living, including lesson modules (text, image), DIY project videos (video), a community forum (text), and a resource library (text, image, video).
output-abstract: 1. Lesson modules, 2. DIY videos, 3. Community forum, 4. Resource library.
output-detail: 1. Lesson modules: Develop comprehensive, easy-to-understand content on various sustainability topics, supplementing with informative images. 2. DIY videos: Create step-by-step guide videos for sustainable home projects. 3. Community forum: Establish a platform for learners to share experiences, challenges, and achievements. 4. Resource library: Compile a wide range of resources, including articles, infographics, and videos, to further support learning.

instruction: Create an eBook on the world's most influential women in history, featuring biographical profiles (text), portrait illustrations (image), voice narrations of selected profiles (audio), and an interactive timeline (text, image).
output-abstract: 1. Biographical profiles, 2. Portrait illustrations, 3. Voice narrations, 4. Interactive timeline.
output-detail: 1. Biographical profiles: Write detailed accounts of the lives, achievements, and impacts of notable women throughout history. 2. Portrait illustrations: Commission artists to create vivid portraits for each profiled individual. 3. Voice narrations: Record professional narrations of selected biographies, providing an auditory learning option. 4. Interactive timeline: Design a timeline featuring key events and figures, enriched with textual descriptions and images.

instruction: Produce a how-to guide for beginner gardeners, including written instructions (text), step-by-step photographic guides (image), video tutorials (video), and a Q&A podcast series (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Written instructions, 2. Photographic guides, 3. Video tutorials, 4. Q&A podcast.
output-detail: 1. Written instructions: Compose clear, detailed guides on basic gardening techniques and tips. 2. Photographic guides: Capture sequential images to visually demonstrate each instructional step. 3. Video tutorials: Film comprehensive tutorials covering garden setup, maintenance, and troubleshooting. 4. Q&A podcast: Host a series answering common gardening questions, featuring guest gardening experts.

instruction: Launch a social media campaign for a local animal shelter, including adoption spotlight posts (text, image), a virtual tour video of the shelter (video), and heartwarming adoption stories podcast series (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Spotlight posts, 2. Shelter tour video, 3. Adoption stories podcast.
output-detail: 1. Spotlight posts: Draft engaging posts highlighting animals available for adoption, including photos and brief bios. 2. Shelter tour video: Create a captivating video showcasing the shelter's facilities and the animals, to foster viewer connection and support. 3. Adoption stories podcast: Produce a series of episodes sharing successful adoption stories to inspire potential adopters and highlight the shelter's impact.

instruction: Develop a fitness app featuring workout guides (text, image), instructional videos (video), personalized progress tracking (text, image), and motivational audio clips (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Workout guides, 2. Instructional videos, 3. Progress tracking, 4. Motivational clips.
output-detail: 1. Workout guides: Write comprehensive guides for various exercises, including step-by-step instructions and accompanying images. 2. Instructional videos: Produce high-quality videos demonstrating correct exercise techniques. 3. Progress tracking: Implement features for users to log their exercises, track progress with text inputs and graphical displays. 4. Motivational clips: Record short, inspiring audio messages to encourage users to continue their fitness journey.

instruction: Create a branding package for a new coffee shop, including the shop logo (image), slogan (text), menu design (text, image), and a promotional jingle (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Shop logo, 2. Slogan, 3. Menu design, 4. Promotional jingle.
output-detail: 1. Shop logo: Design a logo that symbolizes comfort and warmth, embodying the coffee shop's inviting atmosphere. 2. Slogan: Develop a catchy and memorable phrase that embraces the community and coffee culture. 3. Menu design: Create a visually appealing menu that is easy to read, combining text descriptions with images of signature drinks. 4. Promotional jingle: Compose a short, catchy tune that encapsulates the coffee shop's brand identity and can be used in advertisements.

instruction: Curate an art exhibition on surrealism, including a catalog of artworks (text, image), an audio guide (audio), video interviews with contemporary surrealist artists (video), and an interactive VR gallery tour (video, image, audio).
output-abstract: 1. Artwork catalog, 2. Audio guide, 3. Artist interviews, 4. VR gallery tour.
output-detail: 1. Artwork catalog: Compile a detailed catalog with high-quality images of the featured artworks alongside textual descriptions and artists' bios. 2. Audio guide: Produce an engaging audio guide that offers insights into selected artworks and surrealist techniques. 3. Artist interviews: Film conversations with contemporary surrealist artists, discussing their influences and creative processes. 4. VR gallery tour: Develop a virtual reality experience allowing remote attendees to navigate through the exhibition space, integrating audio narratives and detailed views of artworks.

instruction: Construct a thematic escape room experience titled 'Mars Colony Crisis', including puzzle descriptions (text), room design sketches (image), background story narration (audio), and teaser trailer video (video).
output-abstract: 1. Puzzle descriptions, 2. Room sketches, 3. Story narration, 4. Teaser trailer.
output-detail: 1. Puzzle descriptions: Write creative, challenging puzzles that players must solve to 'escape' the Mars colony, tied to the room's theme. 2. Room sketches: Draft detailed sketches of each room's layout and design, indicating where puzzles and clues are located. 3. Story narration: Record a captivating backstory audio that sets the scene for players, explaining the crisis on Mars. 4. Teaser trailer: Produce a gripping video preview of the escape room, highlighting key challenges and the urgency of solving the crisis.

instruction: Produce a bi-weekly newsletter for technology enthusiasts, including industry news highlights (text), tech gadget photos (image), expert opinion podcasts (audio), and video tutorials for using new software (video).
output-abstract: 1. News highlights, 2. Gadget photos, 3. Opinion podcasts, 4. Software tutorials.
output-detail: 1. News highlights: Collate and summarize the most significant recent developments in the technology sector. 2. Gadget photos: Feature high-quality images of the latest tech gadgets and innovations. 3. Opinion podcasts: Record discussions with industry experts on trends, predictions, and the impact of new technologies. 4. Software tutorials: Create step-by-step video guides showing how to get started with and make the most out of new software releases.

instruction: Develop a language learning platform featuring beginner to advanced level courses, including interactive grammar exercises (text, image), pronunciation practice videos (video), cultural context articles (text), and language learning podcasts (audio).
output-abstract: 1. Grammar exercises, 2. Pronunciation videos, 3. Cultural articles, 4. Learning podcasts.
output-detail: 1. Grammar exercises: Craft interactive, visually engaging exercises to teach grammatical rules and principles. 2. Pronunciation videos: Produce clear, instructional videos demonstrating the correct pronunciation of words and phrases. 3. Cultural articles: Write informative articles about the cultural contexts behind language use, incorporating history, traditions, and social norms. 4. Learning podcasts: Host language learning podcasts featuring conversations, storytelling, and interviews to immerse learners in the language.
